trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Afton
There were no other sightings in Afton on or around October 27th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo sets of three glowing lights, in the formation of West-facing arrows, were observed floating above Afton, MN before slowly moving Westward. After gradually disappearing, a third set of lights appeared from the same spot in a vertical zig-zag pattern, before gradually disappearing.
Summary: 11-12 floating orbs/lights were spotted in two different formations (two horizontal arrows and a vertical zig-zag).
